Posts.Content: My Prayers are with you.keep us posted. Pat.
Posts.Title: Here I am again

Posts.Content: Hi,i had a allergic reaction to it.And they stopped my Chemo.I broke out in hives all over.My hands and feet and head itched the worse.Be careful with it.let your Dr. know.They gave me a shot and several other meds.Several months later I still take allergy pills when I start itching.Never had this trouble before.good luck.
Posts.Title: hands are driving me crazy

Posts.Content: I agree its time to shave it.It will help it feel better.Good Luck.(pat)
Posts.Title: Does head soreness go away after hair comes out?? (hopefully??)

Posts.Content: Hello.surgery is done thank GOD.Dr. removed bandages,drain and clamps yesterday.She said the lymph nods were Cancer free and so was the Breast tissue.Thank GOD.I see the Cancer Dr. next week because two weeks ago when having the lumpsectomy was Cancer.So I WILL BE STARTING TREETMENTS SOON.I am very sore and taking more pain pills.Does anyone have any advice on what would help with the pain?I am not able to wear a bra,so i put a camey on.It seams to help some for support.It is terribly painful as several of you know.Thank to all you wonderful people.Love and Prayers. PAT.
Posts.Title: SORE AFTER SURGERY

Posts.Content: Love and Prayers are with you.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Tomorrow's the "Day" (10--21-09)

Posts.Content: HI EVERYONE.I WANTED TO TELL YOU THAT I GOT A NEW PUPPY.HER NAME IS PATCHES.SHE IS ADORABLE.IF ANY OF YOU SEEN MY POST TWO WKS. AGO MY DOG I HAD FOR 12YRS. PASSED.THAT WAS A HARD WEEK.I DIDN,T THINK I WOULD GET A NEW ONE THIS SOON.BUT ME AND MY HUSBAND WENT TO THE ANIMAL SHELTER AND FELL IN LOVE WITH THIS LITTLE GIRL.I PUT HER PICTURE ON HERE I HOPE IT SHOWS.I HOPE I GET HER HOUSE BROKEN SOON BEFORE MY TREETMENTS START.SHE ISN,T DOING TWO BAD.ONE MORE TEST TO COME BACK AND I FIND OUT WHEN AND WHAT TREATMENTS I WILL BE HAVING.MY PET SCAN WAS NEGATIVE,THANK GOD SO I AM THINKING THIS ONE WILL TWO.ANYWAY HAVE A GREAT DAY.LOVE AND PRAYERS. PAT.
Posts.Title: Good Morning

Posts.Content: I bought a hair piece that is just the bangs.I think that would be easier.I got it on ebay pretty cheap.Sounds like you are worried about losing your hair as much as i am.(Pat).
Posts.Title: When I cut my hair...

Posts.Content: Sounds like you need quite time to enjoy memories of your daughter.God bless you.Love and Prayers.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Tomorrow (tonight) is a bit tough....

Posts.Content: I am my heaviest right now.So I cut back this week.I lost 4 pounds.when I went to chemo today I had lost 4 pounds.I was sooo happy.The nurse said we don't want you to loss weight.I am a 100 pounds overweight.I don't understand why they don't want me to loose.Other then it's the chemo treatment its self.what do you think?
Posts.Title: Losing weight on diet

Posts.Content: Hi everyone.I have the list of chemo drugs I received the first treament.taxotere 150 mg.cytoxan 1200.Can you tell me what it was like for you when you got side effects.One of these drugs is like a shur thing that i will loss my hair.I think it is the taxotere but not sure.Does this seem to be the normal mg.Any info would be appriatted.Thank you.(Pat).P.s I am not sure if spelling is right.I am reading a dr.s writting.
Posts.Title: Chemo cocktail ,taxottere,cytoxan

Posts.Content: God bless you.Hang in their.Love and Prayers.(Pat)
Posts.Title: prayers for my daughter

Posts.Content: Oh you sure have Prayers from me.10 yrs. she has fought this beast,what a fighter she is.I will pray for both of you. Pat.
Posts.Title: Benefit for a friend, need prayers

Posts.Content: so sorry you are going through this again.I just got through my second time of treatments.And I was 59 with the last cancer.Just turned 60.I am proof that it is doable.Bless you.
Posts.Title: Back Again

Posts.Content: 2015-11-02. Â  Thank you so much for keeping this going.I sent a message with my info.I am so excited to get to do this again.Thanks again.
Posts.Title: ***2015 Ornament Exchange***

Posts.Content: please email me the name and info on my exchange person please.I have it ready to mail but won't let me retreave thee info.thank you
Posts.Title: ***2015 Ornament Exchange***

Posts.Content: Hi I received it will mail pkg. tomorrow.Thank you so very much.
Posts.Title: ***2015 Ornament Exchange***

Posts.Content: hi,she is lucky to have the support of family.I would ask her what she needs you to do for her.tell her not to feel bad that you want to help.Their is so many things that could help.she will need help in the house work,cooking.Make sure she has what she needs after surgery.Taking her for appointments to the dr.Listning to her if and when she wants to talk about it.maybe money to help if she needs.I started writting a journel when i first started this journey.It helped me alott to writte my thoughts down.I hope this helps.Keep us posted on how she is doing please.Love and Prayers.(Pat).
Posts.Title: My Sister

Posts.Content: I am glad for you.take care.God bless.
Posts.Title: Some 'HAPPY' news -- Just want to share with all of you -- thru the good times, and bad

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed July 2009.I was 52yrs. old the same age my mother had Cancer.
Posts.Title: age when diagnosed?

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed July 2009.I was 52yrs. old the same age my mother had Cancer.
Posts.Title: age when diagnosed?

Posts.Content: Happy birthday.
I was diagnosed July 2009.I was 52yrs. old the same age my mother had Cancer.
Posts.Title: age when diagnosed?

Posts.Content: Hi,like you my hair when it came back the first time I so hoped I was on my way to having hair again.But then I relized that it was loose and if pulling at it a little it would fall out.So i had to shave mine again.The next time it came back it isn,t loose.I have about a inch and a half now.Still wearing hats and wigs.Good luck to you.I had Taxotere also,your right that is a ruff one.Good Luck to you.Love and Prayers.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Hair regrowth while getting Taxotere

Posts.Content: Hi Cathy.My birthday is Jan.23,1957.I am not ashamed of how old I am.I am proud of every year.Thank you.(Love and Prayers.)Pat.
Posts.Title: When is Your Birthday?

Posts.Content: Hi everyone.I so far have no radiation burns,thank God.When do you usually have burns.I keep a close eye on it and I see no redness or burns.Thanks everyone.Love and Prayers.(Pat).
Posts.Title: radiation,10 treatments down.When is the normal to get burns from it?

Posts.Content: Hi Cathy.My birthday is Jan.23,1957.I am not ashamed of how old I am.I am proud of every year.Thank you.(Love and Prayers.)Pat.
Posts.Title: When is Your Birthday?

Posts.Content: Thanks everyone for your support ,kind words and Prayers.I am so thankful that their was no Cancer.I am still dancing with Ned.I can always count on you wonderful people to help me through these things.God bless you all.
Posts.Title: No Colon Cancer,Thank you Jesus

Posts.Content: Hi,I had replys about dying our hair.And some wrotte to use Henna.Can I buy that at walmart?If not where do I get it.I think I have looked at this gray 1in. hair long enough.I probley should wait till it grows more.Thanks again.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Dying Hair with Henna.

Posts.Content: Hi Tracy,I had my first radiation treatment Weds.I ask my Dr. if I could go ahead and get the perscripion for a lotion and she said to wait awhile.I was thinking I would have it when Ineeded it this way.I haven,t been real impressed with my radiation dr.She is very blunt and unfeeling.Not like my Cancer Dr. that would give me a hug sometimes.Sounds like we will finish up about the same time.I can,t wait to have this done.Take care.Love and Prayers.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Overachieving Rad Girl -- would appreciate advice from Rad Graduates!

Posts.Content: Hi,I didn,t refuse chemo but I really thought about it.Then I relize that I needed to do what ever it took to fight this beast.The people that love me are counting on me.I will pray you make the right desicion.Love and Prayers(Pat).
Posts.Title: Has anyone out there refused chemo?

Posts.Content: Been their,done that.You will enjoy not having to fix your hair.I would put shampoe on my bald head sometimes.My hair came back real thick.Its temporary,but was one of the hardest trhings for me to get through.Good luck to you.Love and Prayers.
Posts.Title: I am BALD BABY!?!

Posts.Content: HI,I HAVE NOT POSTED FOR A WEEK OR SO.i AM FEELING BETTER SINCE SURGERY 2 WKS. AGO.i SEE MY Cancer Dr. MON. AND TREETMENTS START SOON.i DO OK TILL IT GETS CLOSE TO REALITY.THEN I GET WORRIED AND SCARED.Does anyone have any advice about questions i need to ask,or any advice at all would be great.And has anyone heard from auroa 2009?thank you all and God bless.
Posts.Title: treatments starting soon

Posts.Content: Hi,I took my daughter and we always had something to talk about.The time went fast,I am a people person so I talked to the nurse,other patients if they wanted to talk.I took magazines but couldn,t consitrate when I was their.They had a tv to watch if you wanted.Good Luck to you.Love and Prayers.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Chemo Chicks: What did you do during your chemo treatments?

Posts.Content: Been their,done that.You will enjoy not having to fix your hair.I would put shampoe on my bald head sometimes.My hair came back real thick.Its temporary,but was one of the hardest trhings for me to get through.Good luck to you.Love and Prayers.
Posts.Title: I am BALD BABY!?!

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I know it sounds crazy but I have a total of two treatments left of Rads.I really want to finish them.just my luck (huh) we have a snow storm moving in here in Ohio today.It hasn,t started yet so we are leaving early to get my treatment.Its been since Jun. all this started with surgerys ,test and treatments.I know most of you can relate to this.Wish me luck.Love and Prayers.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Going for next to last treatment for radiation in a snow storm.Am I nuts(probley).

Posts.Content: Hi everyone.Thanks so much for bringing the pink bus Friday .I sure appriatted it.Surgery went well with laposcopy.Tunors removed.Now I am still waiting on pathology reports.I really could imagine you girls being their with me.On the way their I told my husband to look in mirror at the pink bus.He was really looking.Then I told him about our pink bus.Love you girls.
Posts.Title: Surgery is done.Thanks for bringing the pink bus

Posts.Content: HI,WE ARE IN THE SAME BOAT HERE.I HAD MY FIRST Chemo yesterday and I can not stop eating.I know exactley what you are going through.I ate at least twice what I usually eat.I am already over weight so I don,t need any more weight on me.BUT IT SOUNDS LIKE SOON THINGS MIGHT NOT TASTE GOOD TO US.LIKE YOU I had my comfort foods around.How do you feel after your first treatment?Me I feel a little nausea and restless.I am taking my nausea meds.Take care and let us know how your doing.love and prayers(Pat)
Posts.Title: appetite

Posts.Content: please Pray for my friends mom.She is having surgery today for Breast Cancer.Thank you.
Posts.Title: Prayers needed please

Posts.Content: I was in hospital 5 days.They made the long incision.From bottom of breast all the way down.And I mean all the way down.They removed several tumors,Lymph nodes fatty lining of stomach that we knew had Cancer.Now they don't think it's Ovarian Cancer.So they are reasurchingit more with pathologist .Then I will start Chemo.I have never been so sore.So it's take it easy.Dont want to tear anything loose.Thank you for your Prayers and thoughts.I appriatte it.
Posts.Title: Surgery is done

Posts.Content: HI,I AM PRETTY NEW ON THIS SIGHT.IV HAD 2 SURGERYS AND WAITING FOR MORE TEST RESULTS TO FIND OUT MY TREATMENTS.ITS A WAITING GAME.I HAD A BOUT WITH DEPRESSION LAST WEEK REAL BAD.AFTER A FEW DAYS OF IT I HAD TO TELL MYSELF TO SNAP OUT OF IT.BECAUSE I HAVE PEOPLE THAT LOVE ME AND WANT ME BETTER.I AM SURE I,LL HAVE MORE BOUTS WITH IT.BUT WE HAVE TO KEEP FIGHTING IT.WE HAVE A RIGHT TO FEEL DOWN AND DEPRESSED SOME.BUT WE CAN,T LET IT RULE OUR LIFES.I WANT TO FIGHT THIS BEAST SO I CAN SEE MY GRANDCHILDREN GROW UP.IT IS HARD TO SEE PITY ON PEOPLES FACE.LIKE YOU THAT IS WHY I DON,T TELL VERY MANY PEOPLE.I LIKE THE SAYING SOMEONE WROTE ON HERE.WE NEED TO PULL OUR BIG GIRL PANTYS UP.I.N THE LAST FEW MONTHS IV BEEN DIGONOSED WITH CANCER,COPD AND HEART TROUBLE.I AM AFAID FOR THEM TO CHECK ANYTHING ELES,THEY KEEP FINDING THINGS WRONG.I REMEMBERD YOU WROTE TO ME WHEN I WAS DOWN LAST WEEK.I HOPE I HELPED SOME.I WILL SAY A PRAYER FOR YOU TONIGHT LIKE I DO EVERYONE ON THE BOARDS.MAY GOD BLESS YOU.PPURDIN
Posts.Title: I feel very old today...but I'm not really old

Posts.Content: I hardly ever have a night of sleep unless I take something.Last night I was up untill 3.00 this morning.And I took a sleeping pill.Its ruff I know.My doctor didn,t seem real concerned.She just said to keep taking sleeping pills.Good luck.
Posts.Title: Sleep?

Posts.Content: o I am sorry to hear things are not going well for you.I have two grown children that can not be in the same room together long without bickering.I told them one day,its not about who,s right and who is wrong.I want it stopped.i won,t put up with it.They can argue somewhere eles not around me.We have enough to deal with without the bickering.They should respect you more.God Bless you.Love and Prayers.(Pat).
Posts.Title: If I didn't have kids . . .

Posts.Content: When I eat better foods I sleep better.
Posts.Title: Sleep.

Posts.Content: glad that garbage is gone.what a creep sending such stuff.Thank you again.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Username32 Blocked

Posts.Content: I have not been on here for awhile.But come on some.I can not find out about Claudia.She has always been close to my heart like several of you wonderful people that helped me get through BreastCancer.I keep looking for post about her but never see any.Thank you.Please forgive me but really need to know.
Posts.Title: Please forgive me but I need to know about Claudia,Chenheart

Posts.Content: I had a lumpectomy and they found Cancer.I just finished my treatments.Like you I tuned it out about surgery until I had to think about it.For me was about 2days before surgery.And then I got really scared.I don,t think anyone can say they understand unless they have went through it.I still have the shooting pain with a lumpectomy.And my sister does after 8yrs.I know how scared I was before surgery.I will pray that you get inter strengh to get through this.I have you in my Prayers.By the way you are adorable in your hat.Love and Prayers(Pat).Please let us know how you are doing.You will find allot of love and support on this sight.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy in 5 Days - Having a Hard Time Coming to Terms/Accepting it Emotionally

Posts.Content: Thank you for your concern.I went to get my Chemo today,scared because of reaction from last Chemo.The dr. came in to see me and says we are done.I said what and she said it was two bad a reaction and no more Chemo.She said next one could be worse if posible.So I move on to radiation.I was very very happy.my pet scan after surgery showed no more Cancer.This is all to make extra sure.She said the rounds of Chemo I had would have helped and she felt I would be fine.You take care and keep me posted on how you are doing.Thanks so much.Love and Prayers.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Ppurdin how are you feeling?

Posts.Content: Hi everyone.The new people don,t know me,but some of you do from awhile back.I finished treatments in Jan.I have been taking Arimidex since then.I have had a lot of pain and numbness in my hands and ankles.The Dr. wants me to stop taking it for two weeks.She said if it is the Arimidex it would stop by then.The pain is unbearable and wakes me up through the night.Have any of you had this problem.Also does any of the other Cancer pills come in generic.Someone told me that Femera was going to be.Thanks for any info i appriatte it. I also have my first mamo since Breast Cancer,I am scared out of my mind.Please Pray I get good results. God bless you. Pat.
Posts.Title: Arimidex.

Posts.Content: I will Pray for you and your family.God Bless you.
Posts.Title: Im devastated....need prayers!!!!

Posts.Content: I will Pray for you and your family.God Bless you.
Posts.Title: Im devastated....need prayers!!!!

Posts.Content: Its been over five years since radiation and chemo and lumpectomy and still really tender.
Posts.Title: Breast still tender 1yr later after lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Hi everyone.Some of you know me from 4yrs. Ago whenI went through Breast Cancer.Thurs. I have a mass removed from my colon.I am very worried and scared.But I will do the best I can with what I am handed.If I could ask for your Prayers that day I would greatly appriatte it.A lot of times when I was going through Breast Cancer I would imagine you were all their with me.And that would calm me.Thanks everyone.Love you all.
Posts.Title: I need the Pink bus lady's And Gentlemen

Posts.Content: I did not loose my brows,they got thiner.Eye lashes some came out not all.i would save my money.Good Luck.(Pat).
Posts.Title: Brian Joseph's Lash & Brow Gel???
